ValidationRule.description: Changes can only be done by the Billing Team from Closed Won to Billed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Billed"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "PNG"),
Or( $Profile.Name = "PNG - Sales Executive", $Profile.Name = "PNG - Sales Manager") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change Opportunity to Billed. Please check with the Billing Team to do changes.
